ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: I would pay 6000pp for the bag if it does indeed reduce weight to zero.  But in your haste to critique my post you failed to read it.  I want to know how this
ygData.messageBody:
I would pay 6000pp for the bag if it does indeed reduce weight to zero. But in
your haste to critique my post you failed to read it. I want to know how this
person does indeed know that the bag reduces weight to zero and that it isn't just
a useless item. Which is what I asked the first time.

Conrad Lesnewski wrote:

> From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>
>
> Yes, his information is correct. I'm just confused as to how a container
> that reduces the weight of all items to zero could be considered useless????
> Not worth 6000pp perhaps, but useless?? If you ever come into possession of a
> useless item like this (there are a number of weight reducing containers in
> the game), let me know and I'll be happy to take it off your hands :)
>
> Eron Linver wrote:
>
> > From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
> >
> > Are you sure of this?? Where did you hear this from. I don't want to blow
> > 6000 PP on something to find out it is useless.
> >

--Eron
aeron@...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

from The Simpsons:

"D'OH!" --Homer J. Simpson
